Text: thankyouDear Rod Tomorrow is my last day and I wanted to thankyou before leaving for school It was a great opportunity this year to work in the Power industry and can safely say that I had a great time with my group I had my exit interview yesterday and was made an offer for next year as an Analyst so I will probably be seeing you soon I shall keep in contact during the semester but again thanks for everything Regards Denka Wangdi Summer Analyst Enron Operations Power Settlement Phone
